description: Listed building consent in connection to planning application ref: 2024/2018 for Installation of new rooflight, new front door and internal alterations.
decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.3800000000000001;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">All existing historic features including, but not limited to, chimney pieces, plasterwork, architraves, panelling, doors, staircase balustrading shall remain undisturbed in their existing position and shall be fully protected during the course of works on site, unless specifically authorised otherwise on the drawings hereby approved. The development and works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-05c75a17-7fff-782a-03d6-05ff5a3cffe4"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.3800000000000001;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2024, Paragraphs 202 to 221; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, and LP3 Designated Heritage Assets.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.3800000000000001;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The following elements of the scheme shall not be installed, implemented or carried out unless in accordance with details which shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.3800000000000001;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">a) Details of proposed doors</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ecd80269-7fff-ab1b-84dc-b2e4729c87ff"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.3800000000000001;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2024, Paragraphs 202 to 221; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, and LP3 Designated Heritage Assets.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.3800000000000001;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The replacement roof windows hereby approved shall be of the conservation type, fitted flush with the existing roof slope and shall not project above the plane of the roof. Prior to the commencement of construction, details of the proposed new roof windows shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The required details shall include a manufacturerâ€™s specification and illustration, together with a 1:20 scale elevation drawing showing the glazing pattern and 1:5 scale vertical and horizontal cross section drawings showing the location of the rooflight in relation to the roof structure and covering, the frames, the dimensions of the glazing, the profile and dimensions of the glazing bars and spacers (if any). The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2b015b72-7fff-f134-06b0-82b8470d3661"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.3800000000000001;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building under Sections 16 and 66 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, December 2024, Paragraphs 202 to 221; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, and LP3 Designated Heritage Assets.</span></p>
